com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.configuration

Class ManagementConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.configuration.ManagementConfiguration

  • public final class ManagementConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functionality to create a service management configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CLOUD_SERVICE_NAME
      Defines the cloud service name for the scheduler.
      static java.lang.String JOB_COLLECTION_NAME
      Defines the job collection name for the scheduler.
      static java.lang.String KEYSTORE_PASSWORD
      Defines the password of the keystore.
      static java.lang.String KEYSTORE_PATH
      Defines the path of the keystore.
      static java.lang.String KEYSTORE_TYPE
      Defines the type of the keystore.
      static java.lang.String SUBSCRIPTION_CLOUD_CREDENTIALS
      Defines the subscription cloud credentials object of the Windows Azure account.
      static java.lang.String SUBSCRIPTION_ID
      Defines the subscription ID of the Windows Azure account.
      static java.lang.String URI
      Defines the URI of service management.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public static Configuration configure(java.net.URI uri,
                      java.lang.String subscriptionId,
                      java.lang.String keyStoreLocation,
                      java.lang.String keyStorePassword)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a service management configuration using specified URI, and subscription ID.
        Parameters:
        uri - A URI object that represents the URI of the service end point.
        subscriptionId - A String object that represents the subscription ID.
        keyStoreLocation - A String object that represents the key store location.
        keyStorePassword - A String object that represents the key store password.
        Returns:
        the configuration A Configuration object that can be used when creating an instance of the ManagementContract class.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • configure

        public static Configuration configure(java.net.URI uri,
                      java.lang.String subscriptionId,
                      java.lang.String keyStoreLocation,
                      java.lang.String keyStorePassword,
                      KeyStoreType type,
                      java.lang.String cloudServiceName,
                      java.lang.String jobCollectionName)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a service management configuration using specified URI, and subscription ID.
        Parameters:
        URI - A URI object that represents URI of the service end point.
        subscriptionId - A String object that represents the subscription ID.
        keyStoreLocation - A String object that represents the key store location.
        keyStorePassword - A String object that represents the key store password.
        type - Type of key store.
        cloudServiceName - for A String object that represents the cloud service name for scheduler job.
        jobCollectionName - A String object that represents the job collection name for scheduler job.
        Returns:
        the configuration A Configuration object that can be used when creating an instance of the ManagementContract class.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the key store location or its contents is invalid.

        subscriptionId - A String object that represents the subscription ID.
        keyStoreLocation - the key store location
        keyStorePassword - A String object that represents the password of the keystore.

      • configure

        public static Configuration configure(java.lang.String profile,
                      Configuration configuration,
                      java.net.URI uri,
                      java.lang.String subscriptionId,
                      java.lang.String keyStoreLocation,
                      java.lang.String keyStorePassword,
                      KeyStoreType keyStoreType,
                      java.lang.String cloudServiceName,
                      java.lang.String jobCollectionName)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a service management configuration for the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        profile - A String object that represents the profile.
        configuration - A previously instantiated Configuration object.
        uri - A URI object that represents the URI of the service end point.
        subscriptionId - A String object that represents the subscription ID.
        keyStoreLocation - A String object that represents the key store location
        keyStorePassword - A String object that represents the password of the keystore.
        keyStoreType - The type of key store.
        cloudServiceName - A String object that represents the name of the cloud service.
        jobCollectionName - A String object that represents the name of the job collection.
        Returns:
        A Configuration object that can be used when creating an instance of the ManagementContract class.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
